title: The Debate Over Work From Home Productivity
itunes:title: The Debate Over Work From Home Productivity
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU, provides a coronavirus and vaccine update. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Jenny Surane talks about Citi’s CEO saying that long-term productivity may suffer with remote work. And we Drive to the Close with David Dietze, President and Chief Investment Strategist at Point View Wealth Management.

Host: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
